title: Engage lawyer for consultation
description: Find lawyer specializing in: land law, corporate law, securities law, currency regulation. Budget: 2-5K USD. Legal research completed in 04-LEGAL-MEMO.md

title: Land research: identify regions with cheap land
description: Research regions: Altai Krai, Krasnodar Krai, Tver Oblast, Pskov Oblast, Kaluga Oblast, Voronezh Oblast. Create land price database with 10-20 examples.

title: Connect registration form to backend
description: Set up Supabase or similar to store form submissions. Include: user data, motivation, skills, investor details.
close_reason: Implemented Express.js API with PostgreSQL on Railway. Form submissions saved to registrations table via /api/register endpoint. Includes rate limiting, security headers, and validation.

title: Add real hero background image/video
description: Replace placeholder Unsplash image with custom photography: modern rural houses, blue sky, nature. Consider video option.

title: Record first YouTube video: The Thesis
description: AI unemployment to rural migration thesis video. Honest reasoning, no sales pitch.

title: Add founder photo
description: Replace ФМ placeholder with actual Philip Miller photo in founder section

title: Create privacy policy page
description: Legal requirement for form with personal data collection. RU + EN versions.

title: Create YouTube channel
description: Set up YouTube for long-form content and trust building

title: Create Telegram channel
description: Set up Telegram community channel as primary communication hub

title: Set up Telegram bot for notifications
description: Create Telegram bot that notifies admin of new registrations. Link from success modal.

title: Choose project name/brand identity
description: Select final name (SLOBODA/DEREVNYA/other), register domain, establish brand identity
